subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A ceremony marking the 40th anniversary of the slugger eclipsing Babe Ruth’s home run mark was followed by a solid performance by Bartolo Colon in a 4-0 victory.
snippet: A ceremony marking the 40th anniversary of the slugger eclipsing Babe Ruth’s home run mark was followed by a solid performance by Bartolo Colon in a 4-0 victory.
